nodes.text: Hanna S'kiyah was a female Twi'lek who lived on Naboo during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, her sister was kidnapped by the Naboo pirates and kept prisoner for ransom. Although the pirates used to capture wealthy Naboo noble, Hanna S'kiyah did not have enough money to pay a ransom. Circa 1 ABY, she met a spacer near the Royal Palace in Theed and begged the spacer to rescue her sister. Hanna S'kiyah provided the location of the Pirate Bunker and hoped the spacer could be successful.
